quote_first: He arrived at her house at
quote_last: , two videotapes in one hand, and a single bag of uncooked microwave popcorn in the other.
title: Reprieve
author: James Han Mattson

quote_first: Mrs Eunice Harris pulls back the sleeve of her good coat and checks her good watch. “Indeed yes. Half twelve,” and waves a hand at the Town Hall clock as if it was hers. “Always
quote_last: . Someone put a nail in the time years back."
title: The Coward's Tale
author: Vanessa Gebbie
